name: 4-day Remote Design Sprint
description:
This is a ready template for facilitating your design sprint. ⚡️


At LB*, we often organize design sprints for our clients. Since the beginning of COVID-19, we were forced to organize them remotely. We've decided to create a template based on our expertise, to share with the community.


This template includes:

  1. All design sprint activities
  2. Post-it
  3. Timer
  4. Voting dots
  5. Arrows for flows
  6. Ice breaker
  7. Introduction
  8. Parking lot

& lots of other useful stuff.


Made with ❤️ by LB*.


We are a UX Design Studio based in Bratislava.

Check out our website https://www.lbstudio.sk for more design resources and articles.
